page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content:
{Kickit}is a game of football and cricket. We play with a sponge ball. We use the waste paper bin as the wicket. The ball is bowled to you and you have to kick it. The team or person with the highest score wins.
The{football}we play in the playground is a bit different from real football. We play with a sponge ball. There are not any edges to the pitch except at each goal end. The goals are markings on the playground. When we have picked sides the game starts. There is a lot of end to end football and the games are normally high scoring. Steven Douglas
